alert.note: Alert for Christian; Douglas; Howell; Ozark; Taney; Texas; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 26 at 1:51PM CST until February 27 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 AM CST MONDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Texas, Wright, Christian, Douglas, Howell, Taney and Ozark Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, from 5 PM this afternoon to 2 AM CST Monday. For the Wind Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Christian; Douglas; Howell; Ozark; Taney; Texas; Wright
